title: Augmented Reality Gaming and Affective-Motivational Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts, multimedia learning experience, and basic awareness of AR technology
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environment combining real-time collaboration via personal devices and AR game-based activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain science concepts with over 85% accuracy using AR game mechanics
Learners self-report experiencing flow state during game-based learning activities with over 70% frequency
Learners analyze motivational factors in multimedia learning environments and propose at least three improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
